The aesthetic AI co-pilot that handles your pricing, booking confusion, and client communications. You focus on the art, we'll handle the business.

Your New Workflow

Three steps to a more profitable business.

Snap

Upload a photo of the inspo pic or finished set.

Scan

Our AI identifies every cost driver (chrome, gems, length).

Send

Get an instant price quote and booking text to send.

Tools Built for Techs

Everything you need, nothing you don't.

Lacqr Lens

Never undercharge again. Upload a photo of any design. Our AI identifies every cost driver—from chrome to 3D charms—and generates an instant, itemized price receipt based on your settings.

  • Detects length & shape
  • Counts gems & charms
  • Suggests time estimates

Smart Quote

Client sent a vague inspo pic? We analyze it and tell them exactly what to book. "Book Gel-X + Level 2 Art." No more DM back-and-forth or surprise add-ons at the appointment.

  • Maps to your booking site
  • Pre-writes client replies
  • Reduces booking errors

Client CRM

Keep track of every client's history, preferences, and past sets. Never forget a birthday or a favorite color again.

Business Analytics

See exactly how much you're earning. Track your most popular services and identify where you can increase your rates.

Smart Portfolio

Automatically organize your work by style and price. Show clients exactly what they can get for their budget.

Frequently Asked Questions

How accurate is the pricing AI?

Our AI is trained on thousands of nail designs. It's highly accurate at identifying components, but you always have the final say to adjust the price before sending it.

Can I use my own price list?

Yes! In the Pro plan, you can upload your specific service menu prices so the AI quotes match your salon's rates exactly.

Does it work for all nail shapes?

Absolutely. QuoteCam recognizes all standard shapes (Almond, Coffin, Square, Stiletto) and lengths.

Is there a free trial?

Yes, the Starter plan is free forever for up to 5 scans per month. You can upgrade to Pro anytime.

Can I cancel my subscription?

Yes, you can cancel your Pro subscription at any time. You'll keep access until the end of your billing cycle.

Do I need to download an app?

Lacqr is a web app, meaning you can use it directly in your browser on your phone, tablet, or computer. No download required.
